pullrequest.title: Add ArrangePlugin to arrange models for tasks

content.raw:
Really nice. I was not able to make it to explode modifying the xml, nice check of input parameters.

We should probably include a note on the Chagelog in this pull request. And for a future work, a tutorial could help users to discover this new and shiny feature.
